greeting: Hello welcome to the restaurant dinner for one!
Welcome to our famous restaurant dinner for one!
estimateAmountOfPeople: I would like to estimate the amount of people of your group.
Please let me quickly estimate the amount of people.
sentences.stayInFrontOfMe: Please come and stay in front of me.
sentences.seeingNoPersons: Unfortunately, I don't see any persons
sentences.askAmountToSearch: For how many people should I search a table?
sentences.availableTables: We have tables for {} to {} persons
sentences.askToSearchTableForOnePerson: Would you like me to search a table for a single person?
sentences.askToSearchTableForMultiplePersons: Would you like me to search a table for {} people?
noTablesForAmount: Unfortunately, we do not have a table for this amount of people.
I'm sorry, but we currently don't have a table for this amount of people.
searchTable: Please wait. I will search the perfect table for you.
Please stand by. I try to find a wonderful table for you.
Please wait here and let me search a nice table for you.
moreTimeToSearch: I need some more time to find your table. Thanks for your patience.
noTableAvailable: Unfortunately, all matching tables are already occupied. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
comeBackAnotherDay: We would love to welcome you on another day at the dinner for one restaurant!
sentences.askToFollow: Thank you for your patience. Please follow me to your table.
sentences.assignTable: This is your table. Please wait. A human employee will be serving you shortly. Enjoy your stay.
sentences.error: Unfortunately, something went wrong. I'll try to restart.
